request.description:
### Create New User

This endpoint allows you to create a new user by sending a POST request to the specified URL.

#### Request Body

- `name` (string) - The full name of the user.
    
- `email` (string) - The email address of the user.
    
- `gender` (string) - The gender of the user.
    
- `status` (string) - The status of the user.
    

Example:

``` json
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "johndoe@example.com",
  "gender": "male",
  "status": "active"
}

 ```

#### Response

Upon successful creation, the endpoint returns a status code of 201 and a JSON object containing the details of the newly created user.

Example Response:

``` json
{
  "id": 123,
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "johndoe@example.com",
  "gender": "male",
  "status": "active"
}

 ```
